backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic, reserved for future migrations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing planned logo, UI update, and favicon tasks with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries for all frontend source files, describing their roles and features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with dark theme, Inter font, and favicon linking to the new HND badge asset.
frontend/postcss.config.cjs: PostCSS config enabling TailwindCSS and autoprefixer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app rendering hero, menu, map, and section-reveal navigation using the new HND badge logo.
frontend/src/components/LocationMapPrevi: Embeds Google Maps with loading state and fallback card when embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/MenuCategoryGrid: Renders a menu category header and responsive grid of menu item cards.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Detailed menu card with image, pricing, WhatsApp ordering, and variant selection dialog.
frontend/src/components/RevealableSectio: Wrapper around Section that toggles visibility and aria-hidden based on isRevealed.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a fallback source if the main image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Generic section wrapper applying background styles and padding with a container div.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, desktop nav, and mobile sheet menu triggering section navigation.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Central business config including metadata, hours, contact info, menu items, and image helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth client, login/logout handling, and identity state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealableSections: Manages which sections are revealed and provides smooth scrolling after reveal.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles and custom utilities for a premium dark theme with animations.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp order links and derives menu item variant pricing options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography/container/animate plugins, extended theme settings, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Project state file detailing site requirements, branding updates, menu rules, ordering UX, architectural notes, issues, and image specifications.
